about.title: About
content: CJT Devs is collective of software developers looking to build you your next website or app!
Based out of metro Detroit, we are available for consulating, application/website creation, or any general software development needs.
We also provide a place for developers to share their work and a protfolio about themselves.
Thanks for taking the time to look and we hope to hear from you!
